channel.title: Need help with editing accounts on my server!
channel.description: i need to know how to edit my accounts on testscape (i am using testscape in making my own private server) so that i can be an admin.

item.title: Need help with editing accounts on my server!
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

ANY server.
For your login method:

[ul][li]client.java[/li][li]search for (use the ctrl + f function) the message you see when you login[/li][li]above that add playerRights = 2;[/li][li]save compile restart[/li][/ul]

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with editing accounts on my server!

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with editing accounts on my server!
item.dc:creator: @IconsOfEvil IconsOfEvil
item.description:
@IconsOfEvil wrote:

Or that character can log off and then change it then log back in.
No need for server cancelation

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with editing accounts on my server!

item.title: Need help with editing accounts on my server!
item.dc:creator: @Avalon Avalon
item.description:
@Avalon wrote:

Stop running your server and change:

character-rights = 0

to:

character-rights = 2

Run your server again, and when you log on, you will be an admin.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with editing accounts on my server!
